text: The National Education Union (NEU) is a trade union in the United Kingdom for school teachers, further education lecturers, education support staff and teaching assistants. It was formed by the amalgamation of the National Union of Teachers and the Association of Teachers and Lecturers in 2017. With 510,000 members, it is the largest education union in the UK and Europe. ==References== Category:Trade unions in the United Kingdom Category:Educational organisations in the United Kingdom
title: National Education Union
